name: Pastebin Pokemon Style
description: A pastebin style based on mega altaria
additional_info:
To see this stylesheet download Stylish and add this style, and then load Pastebin. 
Updates:

    13ᵗʰ February 2015:

      - .fieldset.login_field

      - indented it all correctly(to make the code more clear for the users.)
